description: Deliveroo for Business (DFB) is on a path to be the next billion-dollar business unit at Deliveroo. As Deliveroo for Business Lead, you will have the opportunity to lead our B2B function in Singapore. You will manage the sales and account management areas to deliver amazing food experiences at work. You will work closely with the local and international leadership teams in order to strategise and execute ambitious plans and you will be the owner of the full corporate P&L for Singapore. We are only just getting started so we are looking for a talented individual who can think strategically at the highest level while simultaneously managing and executing the day-to-day actions necessary to achieve our goals.  What You’ll Be Doing  Oversee corporate sales and account management in Singapore to grow our B2B business; Manage key accounts directly and strategise on how to build strong B2B relationships and grow our portfolio in Singapore; Work with local and HQ management to make sure your team’s priorities are aligned with local and global Deliveroo goals; Work with the heads of operations and customer service to streamline processes and deliver great experiences for existing clients; Liaise with the marketing team to roll out corporate marketing initiatives; Take ownership over the full P&L and strategise on how to hit top line and bottom line targets; Participate in calls and off-sites with other international corporate heads to share best-practices.  Requirements  You have a natural commercial attitude, understand the corporate world, and are customer-obsessed. You also are:  A talented commercial professional You have +3 years of experience in a B2B commercial role You have a track record of achieving and surpassing commercial targets A strategic thinker, communicator and negotiator: You have strong analytical and organisational skills A demonstrated ability to design strategic plans and execute on goals with high impact results Excellent interpersonal, communication, teamwork, presentation and project management skills You are an empathetic leader, who can not only build but also mentor and inspire a team A relentless executor, motivated and process-driven: You exhibit an ability to motivate and self-motivate You are results-driven You are driven, passionate, entrepreneurial, and a self-starter who questions the status quo and strives for exceptional results An Innovative and creative being You design new opportunities and build internal and external excitement for a new project   Why Deliveroo?  At Deliveroo, it is our mission to build the definitive food company. In order to do that, we’re building a company where everyone can belong, grow and do the best work of their lives  Our mission is to be the definitive food company. We are transforming the way the world eats by making food more convenient and accessible. We give people the opportunity to eat what they want, when and where they want it.  Our journey began with our founder Will, arriving in London and finding it almost impossible to order great food, despite living in one of the world’s best cities for food. In 2013 he got on his bike and founded Deliveroo.  Fast forward to today and Deliveroo can be found in 12 markets, with over 100,000 riders delivering orders from over 140,000 restaurants and stores serving millions of customers in hundreds of cities worldwide.  Delivering great food from restaurants is how we started, but isn’t our only offering. We pioneered the delivery-only kitchen model, Deliveroo Editions, where we use data to identify gaps in the market and bring new brands and cuisines to new areas, giving people more choice in their local neighbourhood. And using our network and technology we provide a growing on-demand grocery service, which has not only brought incredible levels of convenience to our customers but has been a lifeline to so many during COVID.  We operate one of the most complex three sided marketplaces, and we do this in real-time. Millions of customers and thousands of restaurants and riders rely on us to match them within milliseconds, and the algorithms behind our marketplace are the secret sauce that allow us to deliver our orders in under 30 minutes.  There are so many questions we are working on and plenty more we haven’t even encountered. How do we give low income families access to affordable healthy meals? How do we tackle waste? How can we scale our network to tens of millions of orders a day? What does a future layout of a restaurant look like? How do data and technology help restaurants to grow as consumer habits change? How can we take what we know about a customer and offer a personalised selection?  At Deliveroo these are just some of the tough problems we are solving - and there is no challenge that cannot be yours. No solution is owned by a particular team, which means the scope for growth and personal impact is enormous. We are still a small team, making a very large impact, seeking to answer some of the most interesting questions out there. We move fast, value autonomy and ownership, and we are always looking for new ideas.  And we’re just getting started  The size of the opportunity ahead of us is immense. Only 3% of the global food market is online. Contrast that with the digital disruption of other industries, such as from travel (45%) and retail (10%), and it is clear we are at the very beginning of our journey. Despite being one of the world’s fastest growing multi-billion dollar companies, we’re only just getting started.  We hope you’re as excited about the scale of the opportunity as we are and, if you share our ambition, that you’ll join us and be part of this incredible story.  Workplace & Diversity  At Deliveroo we know that people are the heart of the business and we prioritise their welfare. We offer a wide range of competitive benefits in areas including health, family, finance, community, convenience, growth and relocation.  We believe a great workplace is one that represents the world we live in and how beautifully diverse it can be. That means we have no judgement when it comes to any one of the things that make you who you are - your gender, race, sexuality, religion or a secret aversion to coriander. All you need is a passion for (most) food and a desire to be part of one of the fastest growing startups in an incredibly exciting space.
industries: Food & Beverages

We trust you with responsibility early on and support you to draw your own career map that is responsive to your aspirations and priorities in life. Join us and bring your curiosity to life!  Curious? Apply and find more information at https://jobs.vibrantm.com

description: About GaiGai:  Founded in 2015, GaiGai is one of the largest and fastest-growing offline dating agencies in Singapore. With an extensive database of quality clientele, experienced dating practitioners, modern matching technology and a dedicated events team, GaiGai aims to create meaningful connections for singles from all walks of life. GaiGai also has presence in Taiwan (Paktor Premium), Hong Kong (HeyDouble), Malaysia (Datesmith).  The Role:  You are someone who have a passion to contribute to the local dating scene and foster opportunities for singles to find their special someone. You love meeting new people and have a passion for sales. You will go the extra mile to close the deal and you understand how crucial strategic planning is in securing a sale. Finally, you are also someone who constantly strives to achieve your quotas and believe that nothing is impossible!  More That You Should Know!  Responsibilities:  - Meet prospective clients and conduct personal profiling in order to promote and sell customized GaiGai's dating packages and/or image consultancy services to clients. - Liaise with Offline Operations (Matchmaker Team) to ensure prompt and accurate delivery of dating services to your clients. - Identify, source and cold call prospective customers (cold leads) and build positive relationships that will generate future sales or referrals. - Act as bridge between prospective clients and internal stakeholders by identifying opportunities and share feedback, to ensure relevance of dating services to modern singles. - Establish and provide regular updates & reporting in order to ensure targets are met.  Requirements:  - Preferably 1 year of relevant experience in direct sales. B2C preferred. - Good client engagement ability (e.g. communication and presentation skills). - Drive to succeed and focused to achieve the assigned sales quota. - Courageous and ability to take responsibility in the whole sales process.  Why Join Us?  We offer high flexibility in regards to our working models (i.e. remote working, work-from-home). Our salaries are competitive and if you prove to be a superstar, you might even be entitled to an outstanding achievement reward during our "Employee Spotlight" event!  Beyond that, we are deeply focus on our employee's well-being. Along the years, we have developed many people-centered initiatives and we definitely have more up our sleeves! You’ll enjoy benefits catered to your mental health (i.e. Self-Care leave), birthday celebration, wedding occasion, learning and development, and even time to spend with your loved ones (i.e. Family day Friday) + enjoy a one-time sign-on bonus of $500 when you join!

description: Join our global team for a career filled with opportunities to solve challenges both small and large, local and global, simple and complex.  Have you ever stared out at sea and wondered which exotic destinations all these ships you see are coming from and going to? We know, as we are agents in more than 2000 ports around the world.  In Wilhelmsen Ships Agency, we provide our customers with piece of mind while we handle their cargo, their vessels, and their crew. We handle 75,000 port calls per year, which means that every 7 minutes, anywhere around the world, we send a ship safely out to sea again to fulfil its purpose. We match local expertise with strict global standards, making sure we consistently make our customers’ port calls as efficient and safe as possible.  Now more than ever we see that the maritime industry keeps the world going round, and as agents we are the linking pin in the process of transporting goods around the world. Our vision is to shape the maritime industry, and we constantly develop new and improved solutions for our customers, like last mile drone delivery and our online interactive maps showing Covid port restrictions which has reached more than 500,000 users globally.  We now have the opportunity for you to join our global network.  We are looking for a Key Account Manager to develop and lead the sales strategy for the designated customers and collaborate closely with the Ships Agency Managers and other relevant internal resources. If you have a bachelor's degree in Sales and Marketing, with a minimum 5 years of relevant work experience in sales and account management, then this is the role for you.  The Key Account Manager will report to Global Sales Director.  Required Experience And Skills Preferably experience from working in the Maritime Industry. Proven track record when it comes to sales growth. Commercial mind-set. Ambitious and a strong desire for success. Proven communication, negotiation and presentation skills. What You Will Be Doing Drive profitable sales growth by increased customer loyalty. Build the sales pipeline to hit the targets as specified. Be a commercial role model towards rest of Ships Agency division by having extensive customer contact and deal closing focus. Manage and develop the Key Account teams globally and ensure regular team correspondence /sales meetings to secure a results-oriented sales approach and customer strategy implementation. Secure multilevel entry points by using own and other internal resources ensuring wide customer relationships to increase sales. Report on account performance, customer development and take corrective actions. Ensure customer deals generate the most optimal return by proactive contract management. Ensure all customers have approved credit limits in place, and adhere to agreed payment terms and approved credit exposure limits. Ensure accurate and updated information on key accounts and local accounts in WSS SA CRM system including visit reports, opportunities, deals etc. Implement company sales strategy, process, procedures, campaigns and initiatives. We offer a culture and work environment of strong leadership, career development and a job that is both challenging and stimulating.  Sounds interesting? If you can see yourself in this role, please let us know why you are our new Key Account Manager.  You can apply online today through our career portal by creating a ‘Candidate Home’ account. Here you can upload your resume and a motivational letter.  Work location: Singapore  Application deadline: 15 Oct 2021
industries: Information Technology and Services, Oil & Energy, and Financial Services

jobTitle: Business Development Manager, Global Accounts & Solutions
description: About Asendia  Asendia empowers businesses to grow across borders with a range of international e-commerce and mail delivery services. Launched in 2012 by La Poste and Swiss Post, Asendia has the combined expertise of over 1,500 employees across 4 continents. With opera­tions across the world, we bring together a wealth of international and local expertise, and a network that delivers to over 200 countries and territories. Asendia’s heritage as a mail busi­ness is unrivalled, but today we are also at the forefront in providing e-commerce par­cel solutions for e-tailers selling internationally. We provide a number of value added services too, including returns, fulfilment and let­tershop, and we have acquired a number of companies to enhance our ser­vices, including eShopWorld a global e-commerce software business.  About The Role  Business Development Manager, Global Accounts & Solutions  As Business Development Manager, you will work for the Asendia Group as a member of the Global Accounts & Solutions. This is a key role with responsi­bility for retaining and developing some of our most important clients in the APAC region. You will support our end-to-end sales process by analysing business performance, forecasting, and assist with business planning and budgeting. This role will give you the opportunity to work with all of our global subsidiaries and several key stakeholders across a fast-growing business. Strong focus and permanent development on cross-border e-commerce market and logistics solutions shall strengthen the relationship with customers.  About Your Tasks You are the main representative of the GAS team in the APAC region and work closely with and also the key connector to the Global GAS Team in Europe Headquar-ters to set-up the new cross-border commercial products for the existing and new customers in the APAC region. With strong understanding of the European and Asian customers’ behaviours of eCommerce products, together with the respective Market Research teams in the Euro-pean Headquarters, to complete specific market researches and shape the commercial strategy of the Global Accounts & Solutions teams, that targets to attract potential customers in APAC countries, especially in Singapore, Southeast Asia, China and Hong Kong. You are the key contact to the local sales teams in Asendia APAC entities to deliver right service & propo-sitions to customers, and also responsible for onboarding new global accounts for the Group in APAC region. You build strong relationship with subsidiaries and key stakeholders across the business (e.g. finance, solutions and commercial functions) so that you are able to support on the account management of our global accounts. You will take ownership of the GAS team sales pipeline and ensure follow up is done on the opportunities to en-sure successful conversation. You are required to initiate new business opportunities together with the commercial GAS teams situated in different regions and bringing these opportunities between APAC countries and other regions. About Your Profile 5+ years experience in a sales or business development role, if possible in the cross-border transport / e-com-merce / logistics sectors. You have great experience in MS office (especially in Excel and Power Point) as well as strong process and data mapping skills & data analysis and market research experiences. Experience in Sugarcrm.com or a simi-lar CRM is a plus. You are a self-motivated, persistent, and flexible person with the capacity to listen and understand customers’ requirements. You are organised, and able to prio-ritise and manage time effectively. Your strong communication skills in English ensure the capability of working with people of various nationa-lities, on varying levels of hierarchy. Business fluency in English language. Additional business fluency in French, German or Dutch is a welcomed asset. Our Facts  Our mission is to excel in every interaction with our customers. Our values are trust, friendliness, ease of use and our commitment to sustainability. Employees wellbeing and corporate social responsibility are at the heart of our core values.  We wish to instill a strong culture of corporate social responsibility within every employee and hope to create a positive and productive environment where employees can thrive. If this sounds like the kind of place you would like to work and the sort of role you are looking for, then get in touch, we are waiting to hear from you. Please send your application in English to: apac.recruitment@asendia.com, reference number “Asendia 21-17”.
industries: Banking, Financial Services, and Accounting

The consumption solutions and services Business Development Manager serve as a growth engine for the newly formed Commercial and Enterprise Line of Business by generation new business and acquiring new accounts. This can be achieved through account planning, territory planning, researching and prospecting both customers and partners, using business development techniques and various field sales activities for large and untap segments  You will part of a sales team that will be driving multi-hybrid cloud solutions and services to the customers. You can also look forward to interact and collaborate with a diverse and rich list of partners (both hardware and software) where we will work towards transformation traditional IT purchases into consumption based solutions to span across the cloud, core and edge. Helping customer to digitalize their business processes and walking the cloud migration journey with the customer would be one of your key focus. Building a strong customer relationship and being a trusted advisor to our customer is your top priority.  When working on huge complex outsourcing opportunities, you will advocate, orchestrate and motivate the extended sales and bid team. You will be surrounded by endless opportunities to learn from your interactions with various solutions practice team, partners and customers. We are ready to embrace diversity in thought and contribution and are committed to providing an equitable working environment. Your success is the success of the company and we are committed to make that happen.  Responsibilities Prospect, qualify and develop a robust sales pipeline Develop and execute strategic plan for your assigned territory to meet monthly, quarterly and annual order bookings and revenue Managed partner eco-system within your assigned territory Timely and accurate update of opportunities, customer information, forecast to deliver credible management report Advocate hybrid multi cloud solutions, cloud ops and managed services offering to senior executive, key decision makers and partners Engage with customer, Service providers and partners and become a rainmaker and a deal maker. Builds and influences relationship with sales leaders, solution practice leads, delivery leaders and internal support functions to support deal construct and to obtain approval for bid submission To help customer address and resolve business, financial and IT operational challenges Determines business requirements, understands critical business success factors, solution mapping, timeline and position current market solutions and offering In tune and updated with market and competitor offering, in order to provide competitive analysis to the bid team during the bid phase. Present proposals to customers, partners and account teams  Requirements Strong background in sales and business development with customer facing sales experience. Strong working knowledge of public cloud technology and complex hybrid cloud offering based on Opex offerings (IaaS, Paas, PPU) Quick learner of technology and the value it drives help customer address business challenges Passionate about customer success Possesses the ability to articulate business value to senior execution and decision maker Ability to convert technical language into business oriented and value driven conversation Strong sales and business acumen in planning, organizing, information integration and communication, swift decision making Excellent ability to communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing Solid presentation skills Prior coverage with Enterprise and commercial customer would be advantageous Prior experience in selling cloud and Opex solutions is highly desirable A minimum 5 years experience in sales or business development (with frequent customer facing activities) is required Education: A Bachelor Degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science or equivalent

description: At Blackpanda, our sales team is the engine that drives our success. We are seeking a motivated Sales Analyst with a love for tech to help us drive growth across Asia. This is a role which will balance both strategic and operational responsibilities – you will think big picture and also roll-up your sleeves to drive execution of strategic initiatives.  The Sales Analyst will enable the driving of growth of a wide variety of cybersecurity proactive defense services and products as well as cyber resiliency solutions, while helping to position Blackpanda as the premier cybersecurity Digital Forensics and Incident Response team in Asia. The right candidate will possess excellent energy and enthusiasm with a desire to build business across a portfolio of accounts, as well as be capable to manage sales operations, assist in building forecasts, and meet target projections.  Applicants must be based in Hong Kong or Singapore with long-term plans to reside and stay in the city.  Roles and Responsibilities Play a pivotal role in strategic initiatives to accelerate sales and growth, ensuring progress against business objectives Support new growth opportunities for Blackpanda and contribute to the development of associated business cases Set individual and company sales targets with the executive leadership team Track sales goals and report results to executive leadership Coordinate with Marketing on lead generation and service support Coordinate with the Revenue team on channel sales development Understand our ideal customers and how they relate to our product / services Represent the organization and its products / services Support other company personnel and projects, as necessary  Qualifications and Experience This is an entry level position, 2-3 years in tech preferred but not required Ability to learn CRM & connected planning systems, developing systems and process across the organization Knowledge of consulting business models and associated KPIs Ability to work within a multi-national sales team Extroverted, positive attitude with a drive to build relationships Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English Based in Hong Kong or Singapore with long-term plans to remain in the region Bachelor’s degree in a related field Cantonese or Mandarin language skills a plus  Benefits Possible equity awards based on performance Annual bonus based on performance Sales commission program participation Future relocation opportunities to your office of choice Enrollment in the company health plan Future travel and training opportunities Due to the volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We appreciate your understanding.  BLACKPANDA is Asia’s premier cyber security incident response group, hyper-focused on digital forensics and cyber crisis response. Our team consists of an elite cadre of risk and security experts from International military special forces, intelligence, forensics and law enforcement backgrounds. We are highly trained, ready to respond to and help manage crises on short notice, when and wherever needed.   www.blackpanda.com | hello@blackpanda.com

World Fuel Services Corporation is a global leader in the downstream marketing and financing of land, marine and aviation fuel products and related services. With revenues in excess of $27 billion, global fuel supply of 21 billion gallons serving 190 countries, and over 4500 employees, World Fuel Services offers its customers a value-added outsource service for supply, quality control, logistical support and price risk management.  World Kinect Energy Services is trusted by customers worldwide to deliver conventional and renewable liquid fuels, lubricants, electricity and natural gas.  Today, we facilitate fuel, wind and solar power, along with sustainability services and data management for international brands and local businesses.  “We Solve Energy Challenges”  Key Responsibilities: Support development and presentations of prospective client’s request for proposal responses, provide webinar / conference call / in-person presentations to prospects & existing clients, and general sales support services. Research, analyze and interpret data on marketplace trends, competitors, customers, suppliers, and changes in the South and East Asia Energy markets, particularly to regards to renewable electricity and sustainability  Review of existing and proposed government energy related policies as regulatory policies often directly affect the energy and carbon markets. Participate in the development of materials, correspondence and presentations in English and including consulting and other services for clients. The incumbent will work with clients on specific projects and activities, including ongoing communications, project administration and presentation of Kinect analysis, recommendations, and assessments. Provide support in pursuing new sales leads and assist in development of proposals to global and local clients based on their listed and implied needs.  Proposals may be in response to a formal request for proposal or offered per discussions with prospective clients, our an upsell to an existing client.   Engage in renewable electricity, natural gas,, renewable energy certificates, and carbon offset market intelligence and procurement. Understand the variety of liquid fuel supply alternatives and their impact of carbon emissions.  Job Requirements: The incumbent will be a driven, early career individual with a background in energy, sustainability and/or renewable energy.  He/She will be ready to start on day one providing support for the Kinect team, and grow in the role.  Experience: In excess of 2 to 3 years of sales or market development and client management experience in the South and East Asia carbon management, renewable electricity and/or the energy market.   Education: Bachelor Degree: Engineering, Business, or Sustainability degrees are preferred.  Specific Skills & Knowledge Required: Team player with strong relational, interpersonal, analytical and organizational skills. Proven ability to manage complex relationship across geographies, time zones and languages. Good communication skills – written and verbal.  Ability to organize and conduct business level meetings with communication in English, other language skills in Mandarin and/or Bahasa is welcomed. Basic experience with financial and/or energy related quantitative models preferred. Strong decision-making ability, including ability to synthesize information and recommend solutions/preferred options. Ability to perform in an unstructured environment where developing a client’s solution will often require innovation to meet the unique client requested solutions. Agile and highly adaptable. Meticulous and good project management skills Excellent skills with IT tools including excel, Gantt Charts, Self-starter, good researching capabilities and responsible-responsive team player  Geographic Scope & Travel Requirements: South Asia and East Asia  Key Performance Measures: Quantity of new sales achieved Demonstrated sales expertise of specific products and ability to sell in specific geographic regions Ability to connect and develop relationships with key supplier stakeholders
industries: Oil & Energy

description: Company Description  SG Digital, a division of Scientific Games, leads the global gaming market, providing innovative software that powers the world’s most successful betting & gaming operators.  We pride ourselves on product innovation and technical excellence and are constantly adding new applications and new functionality to our product suite, used by billions of end users.  We pride ourselves on technical excellence and are constantly adding new applications and new functionality to our systems, used by a huge range of operators including Singapore Pools, William Hill, Ladbrokes, Sportsbet and TAB New Zealand.  Job Description  We are searching for a high-energy Sales Executive who can discover and recognize opportunities and turn leads into long lasting partnerships throughout the Asia Pacific region. With their product knowledge and understanding of industry trends, the Sales Executive will communicate directly with potential clients and prospects, understand their needs, and recommend new products and services that will help them grow their operations. The Sales Executive will also drive sales strategies and help establish commercial quotas. The Sales Executive will drive growth for the Sports Betting software business including sports platforms and sports betting content with new and existing customers.  Essential Job Functions Accelerate revenue and new customer acquisition to grow the sports betting software business Generate new sales leads and pipeline opportunities Engage the marketing and product teams to develop, customise and localise marketing and product support where new business opportunities exist. Develop a solid understanding of SG Digital’s Sport and Services offering as well as expertise knowledge of the sports betting industry Leverage business intelligence, industry research, and market analysis to drive commercial strategy and growth opportunities Support growth and performance of existing customers and accounts Report sales pipeline progress and contribute to budget planning International travel to customers and industry events as needed Qualifications 2+ years experience in sales, account management and/or business development University degree in commerce, business administration, or equivalent field of study Experience selling enterprise software systems and/or enterprise content Education: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience Essential Knowledge, Skills, & Abilities Strategic thinker with excellent business judgment Ability to network and build relationships including with C-level customers Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to condense complex analyses into executive-level insights and recommendations Data-driven decision making Possess the ability to collaborate across teams Self-directed with proven the ability to think independently Nice To Have Interest in sports or sports betting Experience of selling software in highly regulated environments Knowledge or experience of multiple APAC territories & business cultures Additional Information  Why would you enjoy working with us at SG Digital? Competitive benefits, an open and supportive environment as well as a modern and exciting workplace The opportunity to interact with global teams on a regular basis and the possibility to switch teams and projects as you and our business continues to develop and grow Tangible and genuine development - at SG Digital, you can take your career where you want it to go! Exposure to real work, business-critical projects and the chance to develop some of the world’s leading e-commerce sportsbooks whilst working on exciting client projects and interact with lots of code! And if that’s not enough; you will get to enjoy a stunning work location and flexible working whilst we provide you with the guidance and development skills you need to progress quickly and enhance your career.

description: At Evooq, we are building an ecosystem of solutions that combine data, technology and investment expertise.  Wealth and asset managers use our solutions to rapidly identify investment opportunities, make informed decisions and manage the risk and the lifecycle of the investments.  Description  You are a talented and driven candidate who will thrive in a fast paced sales environment. Ideal for an energetic and ambitious candidate who is looking for a career move into sales and is passionate about technology.  You will work alongside our sales team mentored by a Sales & Relationship Manager with more than 7+ years of track record and 10+ years of experience in banking and Fintech. You will learn firsthand how to identify the right targets, how to approach them, how to present our products, how to engage in procurement processes and discussions as well as in contract negotiations. By a mix of self-driven curiosity and willingness to learn about our products and services as well as mentoring you will become a specialist in B2B financial technology sales.  Scope  Your role is to seek out and speak to leads, carefully understand their needs, qualify opportunities, qualify out when necessary, then proceed to making recommendations to the sales team. Your focus will be on prospecting and approaching potential clients and partners, on leveraging partner contacts and your own network, and on managing the relationship with existing contacts. You will initiate the marketing effort by setting up meetings with key decision makers and by coordinating subsequent client meetings, presentations and workshops, while enhancing the required marketing material. We expect you to develop sustainable relationships with our clients and partners to be able to gain and translate their insights as input for the further development of our product and service offerings and identification of new market opportunities.  Qualifications Must be a self-motivated and positive person, accountable and resourceful Strong listening, verbal and written communications skills to be able to build relationships with clients and internal partners to gain buy-in and commitment Confidence in having 1-to-1 conversations that focus on unlocking opportunities Ability to prioritise tasks and manage time effectively Some experience in finance Bonus Education in finance Experience in sourcing new sales opportunities through outbound cold calls and emails Exposure to Private banking and Wealth management domain Established network to key decision makers  About Us  Evooq is a global provider of technology-driven solutions for wealth and asset managers. We aim to radically simplify the investment process and make investments more accessible and more understandable for professional investors and their clients.  Our clients include some of the world’s largest banks, as well as wealth management companies and pension funds across Europe and Asia.  We have offices in Switzerland and Singapore.
industries: Financial Services

description: SalesTribe is exclusively partnered with Asia Market Entry; a modern business who help international software companies that want to land and expand into the Asia Pacific region. Established in 2012, Asia Market Entry has worked with a number of up and coming technology vendors to build out Asia expansion strategies, drive partner and channel programs, build government relations and incorporate in Singapore.  The team enjoy extreme client loyalty and are now looking to accelerate the business through the rest of 2021 and beyond.  As a Business Development Advisor, you will be a critical cog in the wheel for their success.  What will you do? Work closely with partner organisations to position enterprise software solutions to the Asia Market. Following up on incoming leads received in the region on behalf of AME customers. Channel development on behalf of AME customers, including researching, pitching, and securing an ecosystem of partnerships to complement AME customers, including system integrators, resellers, and consultants. Managing existing accounts, including increasing AME revenue from existing accounts through the upsell of additional services, offerings and markets. Take a strategic approach to prospecting within new industries and targeting new companies Partnering with marketing to plan and organise marketing campaigns and initiatives, including webinars, seminars, whitepapers, and trade events.  What do you have? Experience in the technology world, in a customer facing role. A hunger and drive to get into a full cycle sales role. Organisational skills, able to manage multiple priorities. A can-do, high-energy attitude, driven to exceed goals A passion for helping people and an understanding An ability to self-motivate and work within a start-up environment  Asia Market Entry is a wonderful entry to the world of technology sales. Giving you exposure to a wide technology landscape, incredible mentors and a career path that sets you up for success. The future is very bright.  If you would like to discuss this role further, please apply or contact Peter Dowling on 97980122 or by sending your CV to peter@salestribe.com

description: What’s in it for you? World-class training through our Sales Academy when you join and on-going training from our L&D team and sales leadership Unlimited advancement potential as a sales professional or progression into people leadership Unmatched resources to support your success Inclusive environment with great balance for personal and family life Generous compensation including uncapped commission, accelerators, bonuses & incentive trips About The Team  Our diverse sales team is one with a track record of continuous learning and overachievement. 46% of our sales associates achieved our annual sales recognition trip, Winner’s Circle, in 2019 and 18% were promoted to new roles. Most people leaders have been promoted internally and have delivered great success as an individual contributor in the past. They’re hands-on and enjoy working through challenging client scenarios alongside their team!  What You Need To Be Successful  We’re a traits-based organization that seeks diverse talent to best meet our clients’ needs. We look for sales professionals with strong executive presence, intrinsic drive, natural curiosity and coachability. The experience level we look for is as follows: 5-8 years of consultative, B2B sales experience Experience prospecting to the C-Suite and senior-level leadership of enterprise businesses Quick learning attributes that enable you to pivot and work through ambiguity Ability to demonstrate strong sales process and strategies Track record of over achievement on goals or quotas Bachelor’s degree required, Master’s or advanced degree is a plus Who are we?  Gartner delivers actionable, objective insight to executives and their teams. Our expert guidance and tools enable faster, smarter decisions and stronger performance on an organization’s most critical priorities. We’ve grown exponentially since our founding in 1979 and we're proud to have nearly 16,000 associates globally that support our 14,000+ clients in more than 100 countries .  What makes Gartner a great place to work?  Our teams are composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations. We believe that a variety of experiences makes us stronger—as individuals, as communities and as an organization. That’s why we're recognized worldwide as a great place to work year after year. We've been recognized by Fortune as one of the World’s Most Admired Companies, named a Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality by the Human Rights Campaign Corporate Equality Index and a Best Place to Work for Disability Inclusion by the Disability Equality Index. Looking for a place to turn your big ideas into reality? Join #LifeAtGartner  What We Offer  Our people are our most valuable asset, so we invest in them from Day 1. When you join our team, you’ll have access to a vast array of benefits to help you live your life well. These resources are designed to support your physical, financial and emotional well-being. We encourage continued personal and professional growth through ongoing learning and development opportunities. Our employee resource groups, charity match and volunteer programs keep you connected to your internal Gartner community and causes that matter to you.  The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.  Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at 203-964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com . description: Work for one of the world's fastest growing media intelligence and media monitoring firms. The firm is present in major economies around the world and has a long standing pool of clients in the FMCG, technology and retail sectors. description: Overview  Pico is currently seeking candidates for the role of Sales & Account Manager position. The role requires being a content expert in all services provided by Pico as well as having strong project management & time management skills, attention to detail, outstanding oral / written communication skills, and someone that thrives within a fast-paced environment. We are seeking a mix of an aggressive hunter with outstanding sales acumen, laser focused pipeline management and a keen awareness of industry trends as they relate to our clients as well as someone that can deliver top quality services and support for our existing clients in region to grow the business with them. This position will report to Pico’s Head of APAC Sales. The role offers direct interaction with various clients in the financial market space from Global Tier 1 investment banks to sophisticated latency sensitive trading clients, market makers and other technology vendors in addition to internal sales engineering and client delivery staff.  Responsibilities And Duties (include But Are Not Limited To) Develop strong client relationships with prospective clients and research assigned new leads and qualify opportunities via telephone and email. Act as the primary point of contact for all existing client requests, administrative and technical matters, and new business inquiries in a pre-defined set of accounts. Maintain accurate and up-to-date account plans and opportunity information leveraging Salesforce.com, Confluence, and SharePoint for direct accounts under management. Work closely with the product and business team to provide feedback on any client, prospect or partner requirements. Develop overall knowledge of assigned accounts including products sold, asset classes traded, clients, and business issues; proactively and regularly communicate account status to senior management. Collaborate with sales engineering team to help qualify and ultimately win business. Promote a positive, collaborative environment throughout the organization. Contribute to Pico’s understanding of the competitive landscape, differentiation, and industry trends. Gather high-level requirements from client/prospect and confidently tell the Pico ‘story’ with a high-level overview of our products, services, and value proposition. Build proposals and deliver a curated value proposition to client/prospect. Share client feedback on product, service, and pricing with respective internal team members including Product and Engineering. Interact with various stakeholders on the client side at all levels from junior resources up to C-level; identify decision makers; build and maintain client relationships. Win business with the overall goal of maintaining and growing monthly recurring revenue in your account base relative to established sales targets. Participate in regular team forums, meetings, and training sessions. Education, Skills, And Background (including Experience Requirements) Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) from a 4-year university. Minimum 5 years work-related experience in financial technology service industry, with at least 3 years of account relationship experience supporting large Tier 1 banks; equally comfortable and capable interacting with clients in person as via calls and emails. Practical experience with sales, account management, financial markets and/or the securities industry including client interactions via telephone and face-to-face meetings. Experience with Salesfore.com (or other CRM), MS Office, SharePoint, JIRA. Professional demeanor a must. Self-starter with the ability to prioritize, multitask, and take direction when required. Strong problem solving and analytical skills. Team player (as you will be working with others on larger accounts globally), energetic, enthusiastic and organized. Emphasizes on attention to detail & comfortable acting as a de facto project coordinator who will advocate for both the company and client. Driven and proactive, comfortable escalating issues in context of possible solutions.

description: Here at Anaplan, we have reinvented how companies see, plan, and run their businesses. Our platform allows our customers to uncover new insights, connect their strategy to their plans, and work in ways they had not previously thought possible. We’re growing fast, constantly innovating, and couldn’t be prouder to help our customers move forward with confidence in a sophisticated and changing world.  We are looking for forward-thinking people who bend over backward to put customers first. Individuals who thrive on challenge and are ready to grasp the opportunity of a lifetime. Because we fundamentally believe every colleague brings unique value to our whole. We are a workplace where each person feels seen, heard, and valued, and can contribute their unique talent to our collective effort. We believe that for ourselves and for our customers.  Being a part of the Emerging Markets team in Anaplan means being part of one of the fastest growing cloud vendors and making your mark on the industry. You have the opportunity to work with a team of professionals that are hugely successful, every one of which exceeding their quotas last year (and we have outstanding commission structures). The potential for rapid career growth based on performance and success.  The Emerging Markets business in Anaplan work specifically with partners (for scale of growth and speed to value) with the aim of growing net new business. Based in Singapore and covering Hong Kong, this role allows you to define your market, allowing your true entrepreneurial skills to flourish. The opportunity within this segment is huge. This is no ordinary role, no ordinary team and no ordinary company!  Do you have boundless energy, persistence, and a strong desire to “pursue the win? Are you inspired to bring new ideas to market? Able to challenge the old way of doing things? Are you able to define an addressable market, build multiple GTM plans with multiple partners and support them in joint execution whilst bringing all the stakeholders with you along the way? Then this job is for you!  Core Responsibilities  Reporting directly to the Regional VP Asia, you will work with both internal resources and Partner sales/implementation talent to drive joint customer revenue and expand out the Enterprise & Commerical Markets. Identify, create and lead key sales opportunities, while closely engaging Partners for pre-sales support and Customer implementation Build and drive Anaplan’s business value throughout the selling engagement. Navigating complex prospect environments to align both Partners and Customer Prospects around the Anaplan solution Develop and execute joint value propositions, and Partner/Customer centric strategic plans Ongoing, non-stop development of relationships with both Partners and Customers Build and maintaining a pipeline and forecasting of high-quality opportunities Utilize Anaplan’s value-based selling methodology and Salesforce.com to lead sales processes and accurately forecast business Achieve/Exceed revenue targets Evangelize the Commercial Market team and our directive, as it expands within the region Use your local of the partner ecosystem to support the recruitment and leverage partners and existing customers in your territory to build your Anaplan “franchise” Exemplify Anaplan Core Values, Goals and Objectives Requirements 3-6 years software sales experience - preferably selling EPM, ERP or BI software solutions Experience with Partner Eco-Systems or selling through Partners & GSI’s Network with major clients and partners in your territory Experience selling into commercial & Enterprise companies Strong technical aptitude to learn Anaplan solution quickly Consultative selling skills; customer and partner oriented Team based attitude Excellent communication, presentation skills Balanced decision making and ability to take initiative—Get Stuff Done Consistency and reliability Ability to understand and navigate in a complex sales/software environment Validated ability to meet and exceed a sales quota Travel up to 40% Bachelor’s degree Cantonese language speaking is preferred What We Offer A rewarding, progressive career with a company that values diversity, flexibility and understands the need for a good work/life balance. Market-leading salaries combined with generous bonuses, equity and a range of comprehensive benefits. Regular agile meetups, events and hackathons (both attending and hosting!) Flexible working, catered lunches, a fully stocked kitchen and plenty of parties and events A range of sports, health and wellbeing initiatives 3 days of paid leave every year to help support the charity or cause of your choice. Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion  Build your job in a place that thrives on diversity, inclusion, and belonging. We believe in maintaining a hiring and working experience in which all people are respected and valued, regardless of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, age, neurodiversity, disability status, citizenship, or any other aspect which makes people unique. We hire you for who you are, and we want you to bring your true self to work every day!  COVID-19  Protecting the health and safety of our communities, including our employees and of those considering a career at Anaplan, is our highest priority. We continue to closely monitor the evolving situation and we appreciate your understanding and flexibility with any related changes to our interviewing process.

Passion for YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram video ecosystems, social media marketing, online content and related insights. Understanding of enterprise SaaS sales process. Strong “hustle” mentality with desire to work in a dynamic startup environment where your input can help shape our offerings. Tubular is riding the wave of digital video. Smartphones, social media, and new streaming apps are revolutionizing media and entertainment. Viewers have never had so much great content to choose from, from so many diverse creators, available to watch in so many ways. We serve the world’s greatest media companies and brands, including top movie studios & TV networks, leading technology companies, and the creme of digital-first publishers. We are a team of tech-savvy media enthusiasts. We offer a fast-paced environment with an opportunity to make a real impact on your career, on our company, and the global media industry. With a highly engaged client base, we offer an insider’s view on the rise of the new generation of entertainment.  Our culture is one of openness, and responsibility, paired with flexibility. We encourage open discussions where all opinions are heard. We may disagree but once consensus is reached, we commit to the decision. We love getting things done and having fun together.  We are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse Tubular team. We believe that different perspectives lead to better ideas and more creative solutions that allow us to better understand the needs and interests of our diverse, global community. jobTitle: New Business Strategist, Kickstart (English, Bahasa Indonesia) - Singapore
description: The area: Google Customer Solutions (GCS)  When our millions of advertisers and publishers are happy, so are we! Our Google Customer Solutions (GCS) team of entrepreneurial, enthusiastic and client-focused members are the "human face" of Google, helping entrepreneurs both individually and broadly build their online presence and grow their businesses. We are dedicated to growing the unique needs of advertising companies. Our teams of strategists, analysts, advisers and support specialists collaborate closely to spot and analyze customer needs and trends. In collaboration, we create and implement business plans broadly for all types of businesses.  The role: New Business Strategist, Kickstart (English, Bahasa Indonesia) - Singapore  Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing businesses grow. Using your relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.  Additional Role Description  As a New Business Strategist, you'll leverage your experience in product knowledge, consultation ability, and account management. You will also be responsible for managing the relationship with our acquisitions and same store team for the customer. You will set the vision and strategy for how their marketing plan can reach users.  Responsibilities Prioritize and deliver an outstanding customer experience to Google's advertisers while working towards goals. Work closely with colleagues in New Business Sales and Small and Medium-sized Business (SMB) Sales teams to deliver a seamless customer transition and experience. Implement creative ways to improve our customer’s advertising performance by tailoring and sharing performance-enhancing suggestions, and by promoting other Google products. Provide strategic advice and help our customers get the best return on their advertising investment by working closely in a consultative role with customers. Speak English and Bahasa Indonesia fluently in order to effectively communicate with representatives from external stakeholders in-market. Minimum Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 3 years of experience working in advertising sales or digital marketing. Ability to speak and write in Bahasa Indonesia and English fluently. Preferred Qualifications Experience in managing and customizing solutions to a customer base. Solid understanding of Google's advertising solutions. Demonstrated ability to multi-task and manage multiple projects at a time while paying strict attention to detail. Ability to be a proactive, independent worker with the demonstrated capacity to lead, motivate, and work well with others. Comfortable proactively reaching out to customers, and helping customers add value to their business.
industries: Marketing and Advertising, Computer Software, and Internet

description: Sprout Social is looking for a highly driven and collaborative Account Executive with strong business acumen to join our expanding Growth sales team. Sprout Social is used by over 30,000 brands worldwide including Make-a-wish Foundation, Sony Electronics, Subaru and Edelman. These businesses rely on Sprout to create stronger relationships with their customers through social media  As an Account Executive for the APAC region, your role will be focused on generating new business from existing clients as their product specialist, identifying opportunities for upselling, and increasing individual account values. Additionally, you will partner closely with our Account Management team who will transfer qualified opportunities into your book. Ideally, you will be equally driven by a customer-centric mentality as well as a desire to close new business.  Joining the Growth sales team is an opportunity to flex your skills in both Customer Success and Sales. Contributing at a high level in the Account Executive role will open opportunities to move throughout our growing organization.  Qualifications  These are the minimum qualifications that our hiring team is looking for in this role: 2+ years of closing experience in B2B sales, social media experience is a plus Experience working with Salesforce.com or other CRM platform  Additionally, these are the preferred qualifications that would indicate a particularly strong candidate: Proven track record of success within inside sales or account management, preferably with a SaaS company Exceptional organizational, presentation, and communication skills - phone, email and webinar Technical expertise and ability to acquire knowledge of new products  Within 1 month, you will… Complete Sprout Social's new hire training & onboarding program alongside other new Sprout team members. You'll gain a broader understanding of our products and how your role fits into the organization. Partner with the Manager of Growth Sales to define key success metrics for your role and how you will measure against them. Begin developing familiarity with our business, platform, and applications, as well as our company's key metrics. Acclimate yourself with the day to day responsibilities of Sprout's Growth team by shadowing team members, listening to recorded customer calls and working closely with our dedicated Enablement Manager.  Within 3 months, you will… Outbound to your book of business and begin the process of building relationships with key strategic stakeholders. Understand where we can expand our offerings by expansion into new business units or increasing utilization of our platform with existing users. Own your numbers - consistently meet and exceed your activity goals to build a fruitful pipeline that will provide consistent quota attainment. Conduct active research leveraging all available tools and data sources to understand your clients' brand, culture, KPIs, partners, and success metrics so you can add value throughout your interactions and become a trusted advisor.  Within 6 months, you will… Have built solid relationships at the C-Level with your "book of business". Represent Sprout at conferences and engage potential leads in person at trade shows and events to continue to build our customer base. Become a Sprout Social and social media expert to confidently speak to ever-changing trends, new product features and platform enhancements to help our customers realize their full potential and accomplish their goals. Consistently achieve your revenue targets.  Within 12 months, you will… Consistently meet and exceed monthly activity, pipeline and new business metrics. Step up as a leader to share best practices across the organization and helps others grow from your experiences. Obtain (solicited and unsolicited) and act upon peer and customer feedback.  Of course what is outlined above is the ideal timeline, but things may shift based on business needs and other projects and tasks could be added at the discretion of your manager.  About Sprout Social  Sprout Social powers open communication between individuals, brands and communities through elegant, sophisticated software. We are relentless about solving hard problems for our customers and committed to both customer and team success.  Team Sprout is a group of very talented, smart and passionate people with broad interests and backgrounds. We believe that true employee engagement cannot happen if you can't bring your whole self to work, so we're committed to building a diverse team, embracing an inclusive culture and investing in equity across our organization. That dedication is core to Sprout. We want all candidates, particularly those coming from traditionally underrepresented groups in the technology industry, to know they are welcome at Sprout.  We're proud to regularly be recognized for software, product and company culture achievements. Our team's shared belief in Sprout's mission promotes a culture of openness, empowerment and fun. We have built a benefits program to match the strength of our team. This program includes: Insurance and benefit options that are built for both individuals and families Progressive benefit programs High-quality and well-maintained equipment - your computer will never prevent you from doing your best Growing corporate social responsibility program that is driven by the involvement and passion of our team members  Sprout Social is an equal opportunity employer. Anyone seeking employment here is considered without regards to race, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex (including sexual identity), age, physical or mental disability, pregnancy, veteran or military status, unfavorable discharge from military service, genetic information, sexual orientation, marital status, order of protection status, citizenship status, arrest record or expunged or sealed convictions, or any other legally recognized protected basis under federal, state, or local law. We value the things that make us different and want to see how you can make our team better!

For further information about Ranplan Wireless Ltd please visit www.ranplanwireless.com.  Ranplan Wireless Network Design Ltd welcomes and encourages applications from qualified individuals regardless of sex, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy or maternity, religion or belief.

Account Executive - Remote (Singapore)  App Annie is always looking for extraordinary candidates with Mobile, SaaS, analytics background and we'd love to get to know you! We do not have any current openings for an Account Executive in this location, however, in the event that a position opens up, we'd love for you to be the first person to know! Below is what we traditionally look for:  Something About Us...  App Annie is the industry’s most trusted mobile data and analytics platform. Our mission is to help customers create winning mobile experiences and achieve excellence. We created the mobile app data market and are committed to delivering the industry’s most complete mobile performance offering. We are headquartered in San Francisco with 12 offices worldwide. More than 1,200 enterprise clients and 1 million registered users across the globe and spanning all industries rely on App Annie as the standard to revolutionize their mobile business.  Along with a market defining product, we take great pride in our culture and values and strive to embody them daily! We set a high bar for our success and have made Excellence as our our standard, hold each other Accountable, continuously push Innovation and Win with Style  What can you tell your friends when they ask you what you do?  I’m responsible for driving new business and managing customers. With a strong passion for our customers, our primary focus is growing and nurturing them!  You will be responsible for and take pride in…  App Annie is looking for an experienced, versatile and highly motivated Account Executive with SaaS experience. If you have mobile, and analytics in your background, that’s even better!. You will drive new business as well as manage the existing book of business. Being an expert and presenting how our product suite can help a company create winning strategies for the mobile market Managing the entire sales process from prospecting to close in your assigned territory (including but not limited to email campaigns, cold calling, networking, conferences, trade shows etc.) Developing and maintaining a substantial pipeline of qualified opportunities and consistently maintain an accurate forecast Updating and creating consultative sales proposals and reports as required Managing the entire sales process from prospecting & negotiation to closure Collaborating with internal and external stakeholders to manage complex sales opportunities You can recognize yourself in the following... You have a University Degree or equivalent - Masters/MBA an advantage Excellent communication skills both written and oral in both English and Native language You have extensive dedicated experience in solution selling, selling data analytics tools in Enterprise sales, the mobile app industry or digital marketing space and managing multiple accounts across a variety of different verticals within the mobile app industry A keenly developed competitive nature, mature personality, great team player and constant learner with a technical aptitude to master our products Consistent quarter over quarter track-record of quota attainment Superior communication skills, incredible writing skills, and the ability to capture an audience during a presentation You can have accurate forecasting and pipeline management skills You have experience selling to the media; entertainment, travel, gaming, finance, and retail You are proficient with Salesforce, Google Docs, MS Office and Mac OS suite. And not to forget- tons of energy, passion, humour, and enthusiasm This Is What We Offer… We provide a WFH allowance to set you up for remote work success. Internet allowance for stable internet connection, so your video does not freeze on Zoom. Flexible working days. We love to meet, but if you need to get your kids behind school-zoom, need to leave early to get to your band repetition or gym classes, do your thing. Paid leave, so long as you promise to come back! Health and dental benefits. An international team of talented and engaged people from different cultural backgrounds and locations. Wellbeing allowance for any activity that matters to your wellbeing; (online) gym classes, fitness equipment, mindfulness apps or even childcare support! Unlimited access to online learning platform Udemy to help you develop your skills. Virtual initiatives and events to keep you connected with your colleagues. Yes, I want this job!

description: Sales Executive $3000-$4000 5 days week Redhill  Roles & Responsibilities  - To increase market penetration and identify new business opportunities. - To assist in developing and implementing market strategy. - Contributing to Company profitability by following up on leads & increase customer base. - Grow and retain existing accounts by presenting new services. - Attending of site shows and site visits. - Assist in getting quotation and preparation of tender documentation for GeBIZ/Non-GeBIZ FM job. - Ensure timely completion of tender/ proposal submission before tender closing. Responsible for the development of new customer base by means of cold-calling etc. - Serving existing Clientele by providing excellent customer service on delivery & sales follow-up. - Maintain customer service, satisfaction & support the customer with all information needs. - Prepare forecast, sale report and monitor industry / market trend - Any other assignment as directed by Superior. Company At a Glance  Founded in 2013, Sendbird is the leading user engagement platform trusted by modern digital apps like Reddit, Delivery Hero, Dream 11, Carousell, Teladoc, DoorDash, and Hinge. We allow any app (or Website) to quickly and easily embed rich real-time chat, voice, and video experiences into their app to build connections with users and between users. This could be connecting drivers and consumers in a timely fashion to reduce cancellations for a delivery app, helping buyers get their questions answered from sellers to increase transactions in a digital marketplace, or increasing engagement between users in an online community. The platform has over 150M MAUs from over 50 countries operating in industries ranging from marketplaces, ride-sharing, and online communities to gaming, live video streaming, and healthcare.  The company is headquartered in San Mateo, CA with additional offices in; New York, Seoul, London, Singapore, and Bengaluru and has raised over $220M from leading investors, including: ICONIQ Capital, STEADFAST Capital Ventures, Tiger Global Management, Shasta Ventures, Softbank Vision Fund 2, and Y Combinator.  To Learn More, Visit The Company Website  www.sendbird.com  We are looking for an experienced Strategic Account Executive who can find, support, and grow our largest customers and continue to challenge them to increase in-app chat adoption as part of their core user experience in various use cases. We expect you to develop your leads, transform the imagination of customers and developers, close, and grow strategic mega-deals. We value a tenacious work ethic and being relentlessly resourceful.  Who You Are Relentless work ethic and dedication towards customers Fast learner with a high level of energy, positivity, and curiosity A thoroughbred hunter - excited at the prospect of networking, finding leads, and winning our next largest customers. Competitive and collaborative in equal measure A natural extrovert - Passionate about technology and how this relates to solutions for customer and end-user benefit A compulsive winner Relish change Strong alignment with company values  What You Will Do Own your area of responsibility, engaging with and conducting the wider organization to ensure our continued regional success and attainment of significant new business Identify our next biggest customers Use proven methodologies to gain traction and ultimately win significant new logos Form relationships with co-founders of ‘Unicorns’, Chief Product Officers & Chief Technology Officers. Uncover & drive opportunities of with an annual value in excess of $1MM Work with Sales Development Representatives to target and prospect Manage and grow any accounts you are responsible for increasing traction and awareness and ultimately net new ARR Use your extensive relationships and networking skills to win and upsell new and existing accounts Be an expert in the Sendbird proposition and your prospect’s business, create custom presentations, and work with Sales Engineering to present according to known requirements from your prospects and customers. Represent Sendbird at industry events, host customers, and deliver speaking engagements as necessary to promote the Sendbird brand and message as and when suitable Report and forecast accurately, deliver internal business reviews, and ensure Feedback internally on how we can improve and be comfortable pushing for change  Experience And Skills Technology field face to face sales experience working with developers and product managers Experience in identifying significant, new, and compelling opportunities within large and/or fast-growing organizations Demonstrated ability to close large complex sales opportunities Able to orchestrate around significant opportunities Exceptional verbal and written communication Understanding of SDK/API business and/or a quick learner in B2B technology product space  NICE TO HAVES Experience selling cloud-based and/or middle-ware solutions to developers and product managers Experience in vertical industries (communities, live-streaming, on-demand, e-commerce, gaming, etc.) Experience being a product manager for mobile applications Established network with large digital 1st organizations and/or System Integrators.  Finally, there is no such thing as a perfect candidate. Sendbird is a place where everyone can learn and grow. We encourage you to apply if this role excites you. At Sendbird, one of our core values is Global Citizenship. We respect, promote, and encourage diversity for equal employment opportunities. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal state, or local law.

description: MoonPay builds payments infrastructure for cryptocurrencies. Our on- and off-ramp suite of products provides a seamless experience for converting between fiat and crypto using all major payment methods in over 160 countries. Our mission is to make cryptocurrencies accessible to over a billion people by 2030! 🚀  We are trusted by 250+ leading wallets, websites, and applications. Some of the biggest crypto brands in the world, including Bitcoin.com, Dapper Labs, OpenSea, Argent, ZenGo, Trust Wallet and Spot, rely on our technology. Through these partnerships alone, our products are used by over 5 million users worldwide. 🌎  One of the great things about working at MoonPay is that we are fully remote. Our global team spans 25+ countries, and we pride ourselves on having a connected and inclusive culture that empowers people to do their best work. We give our team autonomy to move fast, innovate and take responsibility. Join us in our mission to build a better financial world!  What You'll Do 👀 Cover and support our top 25 Partners overall with a focus on our Asia clients Responsible for co-leading our Tier 1 client relationships in Asia while working closely with the Head of Partner Success on all Account Management duties Planning and executing our account planning workshops (APW) both internal and external Implementing and revising our Partner Feedback Survey (PFS) quarterly Generating monthly insight reports, analysing data and recommending areas of improvements for our clients Onboarding new clients Co-leading and collaborating year end packages for our Partners Managing all things client related (data requests, new token listings, partner comms, product updates, year-end letters, value reports, conversion rate analysis) Managing and updating our CRM for all clients  You should apply if ✅ You enjoy building and strengthening relationships with our top Partners Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization You have cross functional experience working with teams across an org Enjoy working with a global team 5+ years experience in account management, business development, sales, ideally within a global company Experience evaluating customer needs to suggest upgrades or additional features Strong attention to detail and sound organizational skills BS/BA degree  Nice to have: An interest in the crypto space or experience working at a crypto company Experience in delivering client focused solutions based on customer needs Strong business/commercial acumen and an understanding of major industry trends Leadership, facilitation, and strategic thinking and analytical skills  These are ideal but not all required as we know some people (e.g womxn) are less likely to apply for the role unless they are 100% qualified. We promote a diverse, equitable and inclusive culture at MoonPay.  Logistics 🛠  Unfortunately, we are unable to offer visas of any kind at this time!  Our interview process takes place on Google Hangouts and tends to consist of the following stages: Recruiter call (20-30 minutes) Initial screen (30-45 minutes) Final interview (2 hours)  Please let us know if you require us to make changes in the interview process, and we'll do our best to provide assistance  Benefits 💰 Competitive salary 💰 Stock options 📈 Unlimited holidays 🏝 Home office equipment allowance of $600 USD (or local equivalent) 🪑 Working in a disruptive and fast-growing industry where the possibilities are endless 🚀 Fully remote: your life, your way of working 🌎 Freedom, autonomy and responsibility 💪 Annual company retreat 🧘‍♀️
